original_solution_mapping.L1: In the second month, Vinny lost half as much as he had the first month, so he lost 20 pounds / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In the third month, he again lost half as much which was 10 pounds / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L3: And in the fourth month, he lost 5 pounds / 2 = <<5/2=2.5>>2.5 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L4: So in total, Vinny lost 20 + 10 + 5 + 2.5 = <<20+10+5+2.5=37.5>>37.5 pounds in the first four months.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Over his entire diet, he had lost 300 - 250.5 = <<300-250.5=49.5>>49.5 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L6: So in the fifth month, Vinny must have lost 49.5 pounds total loss - 37.5 pounds loss in the first four months = 12 pounds.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1242.
    Returns: the number of pounds Vinny lost throughout the fifth month.
    """
    # L1
    first_month_loss = 20 # lost 20 pounds in the first month
    half_factor = 2 # WK
    second_month_loss = first_month_loss / half_factor

    # L2
    third_month_loss = second_month_loss / half_factor

    # L3
    fourth_month_loss = third_month_loss / half_factor

    # L4
    total_loss_first_four_months = first_month_loss + second_month_loss + third_month_loss + fourth_month_loss

    # L5
    initial_weight = 300 # Vinny weighed 300 pounds
    final_weight = 250.5 # weighed 250.5 pounds at the end of his diet
    total_loss_entire_diet = initial_weight - final_weight

    # L6
    fifth_month_loss = total_loss_entire_diet - total_loss_first_four_months

    # FA
    answer = fifth_month_loss
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In the second month, Vinny lost half as much as he had the first month, so he lost {first_month_loss} pounds / {half_factor} = <<{first_month_loss}/{half_factor}={second_month_loss}>>{second_month_loss} pounds.
In the third month, he again lost half as much which was {second_month_loss} pounds / {half_factor} = <<{second_month_loss}/{half_factor}={third_month_loss}>>{third_month_loss} pounds.
And in the fourth month, he lost {third_month_loss} pounds / {half_factor} = <<{third_month_loss}/{half_factor}={fourth_month_loss}>>{fourth_month_loss} pounds.

So in total, Vinny lost {first_month_loss} + {second_month_loss} + {third_month_loss} + {fourth_month_loss} = <<{first_month_loss}+{second_month_loss}+{third_month_loss}+{fourth_month_loss}={total_loss_first_four_months}>>{total_loss_first_four_months} pounds in the first four months.
Over his entire diet, he had lost {initial_weight} - {final_weight} = <<{initial_weight}-{final_weight}={total_loss_entire_diet}>>{total_loss_entire_diet} pounds.
So in the fifth month, Vinny must have lost {total_loss_entire_diet} pounds total loss - {total_loss_first_four_months} pounds loss in the first four months = {fifth_month_loss} pounds.
